definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: The metabolic stability of madecassoside in liver microsomes is good.
sentences.chinese: 羥基積雪草苷在大鼠肝微粒體中的代謝穩定性很高。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Punica granatum L. has protective effect against rat liver microsomal lipid peroxidation.
sentences.chinese: 結論石榴皮對大鼠肝微粒體脂質過氧化具有保護作用。

sentences.english: The lipid peroxidation of mitochondrial and micrcsomal membrane of hepatoma cell was enhanced.
sentences.chinese: 使肝癌細胞線粒體和微粒體膜脂質過氧化作用增加。
